      • fire

        @CheckReturnValue
PowerResult<Void> fire​(Player player,
                       ItemStack stack,
                       LivingEntity entity,
                       @Nullable
                       Double value)
        A trigger that fire a power with an entity and an double value (usually the damage)
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        stack - Item that triggered this power
        entity - Entity that involved in this trigger
        value - Value that involved in this trigger
        Returns:
        PowerResult
